originalText.text: Fast and professional service by Rich the plumber. Lina was great and kept us informed of the process and answered every questions I had. The pricing was clear from the beginning.

text.text: Fast and professional service by Rich the plumber. Lina was great and kept us informed of the process and answered every questions I had. The pricing was clear from the beginning.

originalText.text: Rich is the best, hands down. Have always received friendly and prompt service both from Rich and the Hub office. Highly recommend

text.text: Rich is the best, hands down. Have always received friendly and prompt service both from Rich and the Hub office. Highly recommend

originalText.text: amazing company, very communicative, fairly priced, reliable and quick. Called and had my shower fixed within less than 24 hours as a new client. Wouldn't use anyone else!

text.text: amazing company, very communicative, fairly priced, reliable and quick. Called and had my shower fixed within less than 24 hours as a new client. Wouldn't use anyone else!

originalText.text: Very expensive but they get job done. Be aware, they tried to charge an extra $200 from their quote but they backed down when I pushed back

text.text: Very expensive but they get job done. Be aware, they tried to charge an extra $200 from their quote but they backed down when I pushed back

originalText.text:
Hub Plumbing and their staff are wonderful ____ We are a NFP company in New York and HUB was so good to us in terms of pricing as well as the delivery of top grade workmanship every time they were here.

We were required to know everything about each project and Jason was very understanding and empathetic. He took his time many times long hours in explaining the highly technical language of changing gas pipes and all that the task involves to us and our engineer patiently, professionally and generously.

Rich is another gentleman who you can trust his expertise and his words.  HUB came highly recommended to us about two years ago and we thus feel obligated to pass that recommendation with the highest regard HUB deserves to others who might need a trustworthy and honest plumbing crew.  Additionally the people who handle the admin are also so lovely and absolutely on top of their game.
